Text.text: This sample demonstrates convenience classes which let you set a margin at two opposite sides (top/bottom and begin/end).
This panel uses margin class 'sapUiMediumMarginTopBottom' to clear a 32px (2rem) space at the panel's top and bottom.
Since we do not apply horizontal margins in this case, we do not need to reset the panel's default width in this case. Therefore it is NOT necessary to set the modify the panel's 'width' property.
This panel uses margin class 'sapUiMediumMarginBeginEnd' to clear a 32px space at the panel's left and right side.
Since we do apply horizontal margins in this case, we have to set the panel's width to 'auto'.
